name: RuinXplorer
description:
RuinXplorer is a action adventure game, where the player gets to explore amazing temple ruins to seek treasures. You are a brave, experienced hero, who will get past many kinds of traps and obstacles with ease, but do be cautious - you're not alone in the ruins.

Game is a demo.

If you do decide to play the demo, please consider leaving us feedback here in comments or through our google form. Thank you <3

https://forms.gle/UhJGJ29ihc7x3XVj7  

This game is made as a part of 2 month long summer course at Kajaani University of applied sciences, by a team of 9 students.
